#summary Introduction

= Introduction =

Wxamcl is a mud client using wxWidgets 2.9.1.


== Details ==

At the moment there are alpha versions of the client for
  
  * Windows 7
  * Linux (Ubuntu and Debian)
  
The client has all features you would expect from a mud client.
Especially it is highly scriptable, using Lua 5.1.4 as (only) scripting language.
Most of the data files the client uses are lua files and easy to edit.

Scripting allows you to do a lot of things, so there is a script which introduces a mapper using lua and GMCP (via the inbuilt event system) for 
[http://aardwolf.com Aardwolf Mud]
